channel.title: Pages on Taming Knots
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Taming Knots

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there, my name is Brent, but I go by TK on the internet. I’m a writer, hobbyist sysadmin, video game enjoyer, linux journeyman, woodturner, and hobby tourist living in Colorado. I write this blog in my free time. If you would like to recommend something to me or suggest a story idea based on my previous posts, please feel free to drop me a line.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you want to reach out for any reason, please use the form below to send me an email.

item.title: Legal
item.description:
Taming Knots is a static site written in markdown and interpreted/built using hugo using the Hugo-Blog-Awesome theme by Sid and hosted on GitHub Pages.

This website does not collect your personal information.

This website is completely static (except for the contact form)

The contact form is provided by Letterbird, a service provided by Good Enough and they claim they do not sell user data in their privacy policy.

Everything written on this site, unless stated and marked otherwise, is of my own creation.

Nothing on this site is made with the use of generative AI.
